class.name: riptide_rviz/ControlPanel
class.description: RVIZ plugin for controlling the AUV Underwater

class.name: riptide_rviz/FeedforwardPanel
class.description: RVIZ plugin for more easily controlling and tuning the AUV's feedforward forces

class.name: riptide_rviz/ParamPanel
class.description: RVIZ plugin for more tuning controller and other params

class.name: riptide_rviz/MissionPanel
class.description: RVIZ plugin for controlling riptide autonomy while underwater

class.name: riptide_rviz/Bringup
class.description: RVIZ plugin for starting up the riptide software package on remote targets

class.name: riptide_rviz/BaggingPanel
class.description: RVIZ plugin for configuring bagging on remote targets

class.name: riptide_rviz/Actuators
class.description: RVIZ plugin for controlling the actuators on a riptide vehicle

class.name: riptide_rviz/DiagnosticOverlay
class.description: RVIZ Plugin for rendering riptide vehicle diagnostics on the RVIZ display

class.name: riptide_rviz/MappingPanel
class.description: RVIZ plugin for controlling the map

class.name: riptide_rviz/ElectricalPanel
class.description: RVIZ plugin for commanding robot electronics
